name: Bounce in a Box
description:
Oh no, life is so boring trapped inside this box. Let's try to to have fun.

Turnin' round and around, bounce along the sides of the screen to have more and more fun. Tons of fun. Fun fun fun. Just fun.

Activate the power-up for maximum fun effect.

Instructions:
Watch the direction arrow.
Tap to shot the player. 
Tap again to stop it while moving.

Avoid the rotating slapping hand of fate and reach the highest score in this endless casual game.
